content: This PR (#11563) implements a small extension of the existing ∑ i ∈ s with p i, f i notation. ∑ i ∈ s with hi : p i, f i hi is the same notation, but giving access to the proof that p i holds in the body of the sum.
This is now my oldest open PR. Anyone for a review? It's only +27 -18
Pinging @Eric Wieser since he had several comments on an earlier version.
